sentences.sContent: Pare the brown skin from the meat with a very sharp knife.
sentences.sCn: 用一把非常锋利的刀削掉肉上褐色的皮。

sentences.sContent: He took out a slab of cheese, pared off a slice and ate it hastily.
sentences.sCn: 他拿出厚厚的一块奶酪，切下一片急匆匆地吃了。

trans.tranOther: When you pare something, or pare part of it off or away, you cut off its skin or its outer layer
